name: Halloween Party (LuxeL)
description:
You got really drunk at a Halloween party and now you believe that guests are real monsters! Panic stricken and full of alcohol, you start a mess: throw everything around and fill the rooms with garbage! Kick the guests out of house, but avoid to get kicked! Will you fill all the rooms?

This game was realized for the Cine GameJam 2021.

We won the awards for the most innovative gameplay and the most loved by the public.

You can find the original submission page here: https://www.cinetecamilano.it/pgc/games/archivio/22

Credits:

Luca Leonardi (Programmer)

Brunella Russo (2D Artist)

Andrea Pardo (Pixel Artist)

Lorenzo Cacciotti (Composer)
